remarks: A restricted polynomial algebra has the same base set.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jul-2015.)
statement:
ressply1.s $e |- S = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
ressply1.h $e |- H = ( R |`s T ) $.
ressply1.u $e |- U = ( Poly1 ` H ) $.
ressply1.b $e |- B = ( Base ` U ) $.
ressply1.2 $e |- ( ph -> T e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) $.
ressply1.p $e |- P = ( S |`s B ) $.
ressply1bas $p |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` P ) ) $.
